definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
chicken stock/chicken soup/(fig.) chicken soup for the soul – i.e. feel-good motivational stories (often used disparagingly because the stories don't really effect change in people's lives)
to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
different broth but the same old medicine (idiom); a change in name only/a change in form but not in substance
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack

sentences.english: Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您来点什么汤？我们有番茄蛋花汤，酸辣汤。

sentences.english: I would like to have a fried diced chicken with peanuts, rice and soup.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个宫保鸡丁，要米饭，还有一份汤。

sentences.english: Objective To study the receptor mechanism of anti-convulsant effect of Caoguo Zhimu Decoction (CZD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药草果知母汤抗痫作用的受体机制。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of "Cupai Decoction"in the treatment of ovulatory dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察促排卵汤对排卵功能障碍的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Also give me clam chowder and a cup of coffee with milk.
sentences.chinese: 再给我蚶汤和一杯加牛奶的咖啡。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibetan compound prescription of XD shows certain therapeutic and preventive effect on plateau erythrocythemia.
sentences.chinese: 藏药新三果汤对高原红细胞增多症有一定的防治作用。

sentences.english: She then took the chicken bones home and made soup out of them.
sentences.chinese: 然后她把鸡骨头打包回家，做成了汤。

sentences.english: Russian cuisine is famous for its soups such as borscht and meat dishes.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯菜以它的各种汤和荤菜著名于世。

sentences.english: I do apologize for giving you the wrong soup.
sentences.chinese: 我上错汤了，我为此道歉。

sentences.english: But soup should not be wasted, for some salt had been put in it.
sentences.chinese: 然而汤是不应该糟蹋的，里面放得有盐呢。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory effect of Fangfeng and Huangqin decoction in animals.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究防风黄芩汤的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: My investments soured , though, and I lost the money.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我的投资泡了汤，钱血本无归。

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 汤名扬的爸爸来到部队探望儿子，父子二人促膝谈心。

sentences.english: 'What about sending a message via email?' suggested Mr. Tompkins.
sentences.chinese: “如果是发送一条电子邮件消息呢？”汤普金斯建议。

sentences.english: First, I notice that you offer soup and a half-sandwich?
sentences.chinese: 第一，我发现你们这有汤和半个三明治？

definition: clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
